name: Dream Land (Dairyrice)
description:
Dreamy Winter is an amusement park filled with inner emotion within ourselves set inside a dream winter wonderland. Exploring internal feeling and experience for these rides during the season.

Controls:

Up/Down/Left/Right: W/S/A/D

Speed up: Hold Shift key while moving

Jump: Space Key

Camera: Mouse/Trackpad

Team Members:

Project Producer: Sharon Tran

Lead Designer: Jenny Calaunan

Lead Unity Developer: Derek Bui

Lead Assistant Unity Developer: Mia Wang
